content.rendered:
Cookie Policy

When you use or visit the impextur.com website of Impextur Construction Import Export Trade Limited Company, we may place cookies on your computer or device and receive the information stored in these cookies. Cookies are small pieces of text used to store information in internet browsers. Cookies are used to collect and hold identifiers and other information on computers, phones and other devices. Other technologies are used for similar purposes, such as the data we hold in your web browser or device, identifiers associated with your device, and other software. In this policy, all of these technologies will be referred to as “cookies”.

Cookies; It helps us deliver, protect and improve our services by personalizing content, customizing ads, measuring ad results, and providing a safer experience.


Cookie Use Purpose We use it to verify your account and determine that you are logged into your account, to keep your data and services safe and secure, to improve our service quality, to better understand how our users use our services and to improve these services.

Cookies; It helps us deliver, protect and improve our services by personalizing content, customizing ads, measuring ad results, and providing a safer experience.

Third parties also use cookies in their own sites and applications in connection with the impextur.com website. To understand how other parties use cookies, please review their respective policies.

Cookie Types
Temporary types :
Temporary cookies are stored temporarily only during the session and are removed as soon as you close your browser. Persistent cookies: Persistent cookies remain on the computer/mobile device after you close the browser or application and are used to recognize you when we return to the website. A new cookie is loaded until the persistent cookies expire, remaining on your computer or mobile device.


Target/Advertising Cookies: Advertising cookies are cookies that are installed by a third party during an application/website or usage visit. Advertising cookies are used to transmit some information about your visit to our site to a third party.

Mandatory Cookies: Necessary and important cookie. It allows you to create a user account, log in and browse our website. Persistent cookies remain on your computer or mobile device after you close the browser or application and are used to recognize you when you return to our website. Mandatory cookies are anonymous. Performance and analytics cookies: Used to collect information about how you use websites and applications (pages followed by them, average duration of visit, etc.) to improve the overall operation of visitors on websites and applications.

Functionality cookies: Functionality cookies are cookies used to facilitate the visit and improve your browsing experience on the website. Allows you to remember certain settings, such as your preferred language, layout or color scheme.

Advertising cookies: Advertising and personalization cookies are used to collect information about visitor browsing behavior of our websites in order to customize our advertising and website content for their own personal benefit.

Tracking cookies: Tracking cookies are used to monitor the Internet browsing behavior of visitors and to collect data and information on their browsing behavior from various websites they visit.

Browser Cookie Controls Your browser or device may offer some additional settings that allow you to choose whether or not to place browser cookies and to delete cookies. For more information about these controls, see the help materials for your browser or device. If you have disabled the use of browser cookies, some parts of the impextur.com website may not work properly.
